CSS Demo

“ the checkbox hack ”

Hva er CSS?

  • Cascading Style Sheet
  • Definere utseende
    • HTML
    • XML
  • Utseende vs. struktur

Eksempelkode:

div {
  width: 800px;
  height: 600px;
  background-color: solid #000;
}

Hvordan funker det?

<label for="toggle-1">Halla</label>
<input type="checkbox" id="toggle-1">
<div></div>

input[type=checkbox] {
    display: none;
}

div {
    background: green;
    width: 400px;
    height: 400px;
}

input[type=checkbox]:checked~div {
    background: red;
}
